title: An Act relative to social media, algorithm accountability, and transparency

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Velis, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 51) of John C. Velis for legislation relative to social media, algorithm accountability, and transparency.  Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

related_entities.name: committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

actions.description: Hearing rescheduled to 09/11/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to include Virtual
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

committee on Senate Ways and Means
